name: The Fox's Coat
description:
This is a short interactive tale made with Bitsy about a bear looking for their missing friend, the fox, who needs your help.

Move with the arrow keys and interact with characters and objects by walking up to or over them.

I always enjoyed games like Ultimate's Sabre Wulf and wanted to make something as a bit of a nod to games like that. I also enjoy fables and folk lore and was trying to give the story an element of that too.
